General.Name: Austindo Nusantara Jaya Tbk
General.Description: PT Austindo Nusantara Jaya Tbk engages in the oil palm plantation business in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Palm Oil, Sago, Renewable Energy, and Others. The company offers crude palm oil and palm kernel, and edamame, as well as involved in horticultural agriculture. It also processes sago and tobacco. The company was formerly known as PT Austindo Teguh Jaya. PT Austindo Nusantara Jaya Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
